name: Offer Nissim
description: '''Offer Nissim''' ({{langx|he|עופר ניסים}}) is an Israeli [[DJ]], remixer, and record producer. He produced the winning entry of the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1998]], "[[Diva (Dana International song)|Diva]]", by [[Dana International]]. Besides his work with Dana International, Nissim has often collaborated with [[Maya Simantov]] on songs such as "For your Love", "Everybody Needs a Man", "Alone", and "First Time", and has produced official remixes for various artists, including [[Madonna (entertainer)|Madonna]] and [[Cher]].
